original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Balak took Balaam, and brought him up into the high places of Baal, that thence he might see the utmost part of the people.
korean_text: 아침에 발락이 발람과 함께 하고 그를 인도하여 바알의 산당에 오르매 발람이 거기서 이스라엘 백성의 진 끝까지 보니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass on the morrow
and brought him up into the high places of Baal

sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 그가 볼 수 있게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: the utmost part of the people
